## cilium bpf ipcache list

List endpoint IPs (local and remote) and their corresponding security identities

### Synopsis


List endpoint IPs (local and remote) and their corresponding security identities.

```
cilium bpf ipcache list
```

### Options

```
  -o, --output string   json| jsonpath='{}'
```
